Creating an own Macro

Creating an own Macro in Java is very simple. Start copying any of the existing examples.
The Job example from the previous exercies can be used.
  1. Create a new Package inside of your project, called "com.polarion.macros"
  2. Create a new class "HelloWorld"
  3. Create a function "String helloWorld()"
  4. Return value of this function is "Hello World!"
Add the following Part to hivemodule.xml

<contribution configuration-id="com.polarion.alm.wiki.renderingContext">
   <item key="helloWorld" value="instance:com.polarion.macros.HelloWorld" />
</contribution>

Now start the polarion server and check in any wiki page if $helloWorld.helloWorld() returns the correct value.
